sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Walder Frey has no daughter named "Derwa" - nor does he have any daughters or granddaughters named "Derwa". For that matter, no character with the first name "Derwa" has ever appeared in the books.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Derwa is one of the many daughters of [[Walder Frey]], the [[Lord of the Crossing]].
===[[Season 3]]===
Along with several of Lord Frey's other daughters and granddaughters, [[Robb Stark]] had the option of marrying her. When he arrives at [[The Twins]] for his uncle [[Edmure Tully|Edmure]]'sÂ [[Red Wedding|wedding]], Robb apologizesÂ for his slight against them.<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
